key_findings.finding: Strong positive correlation (0.79) between x and y. As x increases, y tends to increase.
Strong positive correlation (0.79) between y and x. As x increases, y tends to increase.
x has a strong impact on y (R² = 0.62). When x increases, y typically increases.

recommendations.recommendation: Conduct deeper time-series analysis on x to understand factors driving the increasing trend
Conduct deeper time-series analysis on y to understand factors driving the increasing trend
Investigate potential causal relationship between x and y
Investigate identified outliers to determine if they represent data quality issues or valuable business exceptions
